mainPage.mainText: MENTAL HEALTH AND PSYCHOSOCIAL SUPPORT ONLINE COURSE
mainPage.mainTextDesc: Learn about Mental health and psychosocial support (MHPSS), get general insight on mental health conditions and explore skills to provide mental health and psychosocial support

guarantee.adaptiveDesc: The course is designed for first-line professionals in Turkmenistan working with youth and women.
guarantee.relevanceDesc: Explore and build skills to provide MHPSS via a practical online course
guarantee.certificationDesc: Download certificate of completion upon successful completion of all stages

info.title: The aim of the online MHPSS course:
info.desc: To build capacities of helping professionals on providing community-based mental health and psychosocial support to vulnerable youth and women as a preventive measure
info.courseFor: The course is designed to build capacities of frontline service providers, so that they can
info.courseFor1: understand the mental health continuum, mental health disorders and factors that impact mental health in the context of the lifespan approach;
info.courseFor2: understand the role of supporting individual mental health and well-being in preventing conflicts, strengthening social cohesion, and strengthening community resilience;
info.courseFor3: understand the MHPSS intervention pyramid and ability to match mental health services with the needs of vulnerable people, prioritising youth-at-risk and women at the community level;
info.courseFor4: identify signs of stress, trauma and other mental health conditions in individuals;
info.courseFor5: provide basic mental health and psychosocial support for individuals;
info.courseFor6: understand importance of doing referrals to specialized mental health and other services relevant to individual needs;
info.courseFor7: take care of one's mental health using evidence-based self-help tools and skills.
info.target1: Learn about mental health and its determinants;
info.target2: Build competencies in the area of mental health promotion, prevention, and support;
info.target3: Increase knowledge of evidence-based scalable mental health and psychosocial interventions;
info.target4: Develop skills to provide basic MHPSS.
